channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- JenkinsAppDynamics Dashboard Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- JenkinsAppDynamics Dashboard Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003039|2024-08-05T03:07:16.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkinsappdynamics%20dashboard%20plugin
item.description: An insufficiently protected credentials vulnerability exists in JenkinsAppDynamics Dashboard Plugin 1.0.14 and earlier in src/main/java/nl/codecentric/jenkins/appd/AppDynamicsResultsPublisher.java that allows attackers without permission to obtain passwords configured in jobs to obtain them.
